channel.title: How do I make my client compatible with my server source
channel.description:
When I go to connect to my server it disconnects me right away automatically. Obviously because the server source only allows a connection from the client of that server. However when I run the client that was made for the server I get this error:
[code=java]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248)[/code]
So I went about just getting a different client to use. So if anyone could tell me either how to fix the error or get my new client to connect that would be great. Thanks in advance.

item.title: How do I make my client compatible with my server source
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“jeevelporse, post:5, topic:417461”][quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=520018.msg3776890#msg3776890 date=1318160647]
The errors you get when you try to log in and get disconnected would help tremendously
[/quote]

[10/9/11 8:50 PM]: [REGISTERED]: Jeevelporse [10/9/11 8:50 PM]: Game saved for player Jeevelporse [10/9/11 8:50 PM]: [DEREGISTERED]: Jeevelporse[/quote]

The errors from the client… It has to be saying something if you disconnect instantly like that

Read full topic
